column4: Hey guys, I was wondering, how do you change the effect that is used when an application closes? I've seen interesting fire or color effects, but I can't find anything like that in the CompizConfig settings manager
- you might want to look at the plug ins that compiz has loaded.
Ah, do you happen to know the name of that plug-in?
- i'm no expert on compiz, but open ccsm, click on preferences then look under the plugin list tab... hopefully that will help you out some
